word: NOW HERE IS PRINTED THE PRINCIPLES THAT GOVERN ROYALTIES. THIS EXPOSES THE WHOLE THING, TOO, AND TELLS US WHERE THE MISCHIEF IS THAT COMES FROM SUCH THINGS AS THAT. I READ FROM THE LITTLE TRACT ENTITLED, "SPECIAL INSTRUCTION RELATING TO THE REVIEW AND HERALD OFFICE, AND THE WORK IN BATTLE CREEK." FIVE HUNDRED COPIES OF THIS WERE PRINTED AND DISTRIBUTED TO THE BRETHREN HERE IN THE OFFICE TWO YEARS AGO. I BEGIN READING FROM PAGE 26:--
